summary: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.
cast: Aldo Fabrizi|Anna Magnani|Marcello Pagliero|Vito Annichiarico|Nando Bruno|Harry Feist|Giovanna Galletti|Francesco Grandjacquet|Eduardo Passarelli|Maria Michi|Carla Rovere|Carlo Sindici|Joop van Hulzen|√Åkos Tolnay|Caterina Di Furia|Laura Clara Giudice|Turi Pandolfini|Amalia Pellegrini|Spartaco Ricci|Doretta Sestan|Alberto Tavazzi
keywords: world war two in italy|year 1944|nazi|priest|nazi occupation
title: Roma, ciudad abierta
